name: QGIS Tutorial
tagline: A Tutorial for QGIS - Currently Written for QGIS v2.4
body:
### Items covered in this tutorial include importing spatial data, dealing with projections, basic raster and vector manipulations, using some plugins, and creating a map.

#### Use the links below to access the tutorial and data files: * [Tutorial as a PDF](QGIS-Tutorial/Treglia_OSOS Notes_V1.01.pdf) * [Tutorial as a Webpage](QGIS-Tutorial/Treglia_OSOS Notes_V1.01.html) * [All of sample files in a .zip file](Treglia_Sample Data.zip) Alternatively, download all materials as a .zip or Tarball file using one of the icons above, or go to the main [GitHub repository.](https://github.com/mltConsEcol/QGIS-Tutorial)

#### [Click here to see other tutorials available from the QGIS Website](http://qgis.org/en/site/forusers/trainingmaterial/index.html)

***Please contact me if you have any comments or problems
([Click here to see my current contact information](./Contact.html))***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
